registerrequired-fillindetailsaccount: Cool! You want to be part of the Part-up movement! Fill in some more details, so we can call you by name and complete your account.
registerrequired-form-email-placeholder: We only send you emails if you want us to
registerrequired-form-password-placehold: Don't make it too easy to guess
registerrequired-form-password-tooltip: You know that hackers get smarter every day. Pick a password that is not too easy to guess. Try using special characters, numbers and capitals in your password.
registerrequired-form-network-label: Wil je nu al aansluiten bij een (organisatie)netwerk?
registerrequired-form-network-tooltip: Even without a network, you can start your own Part-ups and we suggest Part-ups you can contribute to. By joining an existing network, you also get access to the wishes, talents and means of that network.
